entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan support is failing in some circumstances #79477
  • Host tests fail to restore on osx-arm64 #79470
  • An empty .NET 7.0 app allocates huge amount of memory (579 MB / 4 GB) on Windows 7 64 bit . #79469
  • [mono][interp] tiering.c:82, condition `is_ok (error)' not met #79468
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: new System.Diagnostics.StackTrace(System.Threading.Thread) #79463
  • GetCodeHeaderData returns E_FAIL #79462
  • Additional metrics for .NET Core and ASP.NET Core #79459
  • Introduce IServiceActivator<T> #79458
  • .NET NativeAOT x64 builds on macOS adds dependency on @rpath/libswiftCore.dylib instead of correct install path #79454
  • Hosting DirectSettingsOverrideConfigurationSetting and ConfigurationSettingCanInfluenceEnvironment test failures in CI #79453
  • Every connection to Kestrel suddenly timing out, part of the application seems "frozen" #79446
  • HttpClient becomes very slow and cancel request after migrating to NET 7 #79443
  • [Android] Wrong exception HttpClient when SSL certificate is expired #79442
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Provide async callback for Remote certification validation in HttpClient #79441
  • undefined reference to 'FreeLibraryAndExitThread' #79440
    8.0.0
  • Precondition failure: File has not had execution verified #79439
  • Windows.Forms.Form opening outside of visible desktop/screen area #79438
  • [NativeAOT] 230 kB size regression in Hello World from Enum changes #79437
  • [NativeAOT] Accessing static variables, ideally, should not call runtime helpers. #79436
  • Test failure ilasm\\PortablePdb\\IlasmPortablePdbTests\\IlasmPortablePdbTests.cmd #79431
  • Test failure JIT/jit64/regress/vsw/539509/test1/test1.sh #79430

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Generic overload for Convert.ToString #79474
  • Test failure JIT\\Regression\\JitBlue\\Runtime_63354\\Runtime_63354\\Runtime_63354.cmd #78898
    8.0.0
  • Consider spilling GPR in vector registers instead of memory #79464
  • .NET throw System.ExecutionEngineException on Step Into 2D Array with JMC disabled. #79415
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] Test run crashing with `exiting due to exception: 613560632` from V8, and browser #74303
    8.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 9 Regressions on 12/1/2022 11:48:13 PM #79337
  • [MONO][Interp] baseservices/varargs/varargsupport* failed with interpreter #54401
    8.0.0
  • System.Tests.ArrayTests.CreateInstance test failing in NativeAOT #79403
  • Improve the error handling of jit failures to identify when profiler provided IL is in use #8521
    Future
  • Deadlock with ClientWebsocket and lock blocks/Lazy objects #79171

PullRequests

Created

  • This fixes emitGetVexPrefixSize to support detecting 2-byte prefix support #79478
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix for COM Weakreference test failure under JIT stress. #79476
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • R2RDump assembly qualification and a bit of cleanup #79475
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Use non-generic Array.Sort in EnumInfo on nativeaot #79473
  • ifdef out unsupported Enum underlying types for nativeaot #79472
  • Rangelistmap with native eh free il throw on Linux #79471
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Always set `addlDelta` to zero on x86 #79467
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Improve terser setup #79466
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Update suppressions now that netframework facade has forwards #79465
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Use Roslyn support for RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan (or field caching downlevel) #79461
    area-Meta
  • Use ArgumentOutOfRangeException.Throw helpers in more places #79460
    area-Meta, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] reduce MethodImplOptions.NoInlining #79457
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Hosting DirectSettingsOverrideConfigurationSetting and ConfigurationSettingCanInfluenceEnvironment test failures in CI #79455
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Delete unused FreeLibraryAndExitThread from PAL #79452
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • [mono][llvm] Added a null-check for 2-dim array access #79450
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [mono][interp] Add unbox when calling valuetype method through delegate #79445
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [EXPERIMENTAL - will be reverted] Opt-in for msbuild server in CI #79444
  • Only create MethodTable optional fields when needed #79435
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • support server ALPN on macOS #79434
    area-System.Net.Security, os-mac-os-x
  • Consider numeric string json for EnumConverter. #79432
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Fix `IDesignerSerializationManager` nullability #79429
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • [JIT] EXPERIMENT - Alternative way to remove `mov` instructions #79428
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement DynamicMethod.RTDynamicMethod.CreateDelegate. #79427
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Fix GC stress C on macOS arm64 #79426
    area-PAL-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Remove RequiresDynamicCode from Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection #79425
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection

Merged

  • A gentle reminder that TraceGC is turned off #79183
    area-GC-coreclr
  • fix determin lib name varation logic #79370
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Fixing assert on variable live range for simd12 LCL / STORE_LCL #79182
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reflection context tests working #77999
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Add Vector128.Narrow intrinsics #79447
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Add a managed cache for flags in RuntimeType. #78840
    area-CoreLib-mono
  • [wasm] Wasm.Build.Tests - build projects for net8.0 by default #79254
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] optimize interop startup and linker hints #77256
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Don't embed bitcode on tvOS anymore #79349
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • [mono][tests] Throw InvalidProgramException when ENDFILTER has invalid value type or invalid number of values #79394
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Fix creation of pointer arrays #79433
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Temporarily disable NoCallback_RevokedCertificate_NoRevocationChecking_Succeeds #79407
    area-System.Net.Http

Updated

  • [release/7.0] Fix dump creation on MacOS Ventura #79360
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.3
  • [release/6.0] Fix dump creation on MacOS Ventura #79365
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.3
  • Fix the multicore performance of mapping from an instruction pointer to a MethodDesc #79021
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Enable `runtime-coreclr jitstress-isas-avx512` pipeline on Linux #79417
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • fix SslStream.IsMutuallyAuthenticated with cached credentials #79128
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [mono][wasm] Bundle assemblies as WebCIL #79416
    arch-wasm, area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • Double IndexOf throughput for chars #78861
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • improve symlink handling in Ping #79323
    area-System.Net
  • Use IndexOfAnyValues in the RegexCompiler and source gen #78927
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 8.0.0
  • [IGNORE][wasi][wasm] Testing wasi build #79388
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • JIT: experiment with early liveness and use it for forward sub and last-use copy elision #79346
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Adding new ReadyToRun helper for static cctor #76898
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement DivRem intrinsic for X86 #66551
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Enforce HttpClient limits on GetFromJsonAsync #79386
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • Avx512 upper regs variable (Draft) #79414
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Mono musl support #76500
    area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution
  • Standardize EventSource behavior in ETW for null values #77172
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, community-contribution
  • Don't use IlcPath in NativeAOT targets #79233
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Disallow `IND<struct>` except as a source of `STORE_DYN_BLK` #74784
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Ensure that `TryGetContainableHWIntrinsicOp` is non-mutating #79363
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make System.Reflection.Emit public types abstract #78544
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono][interp] Throw invalid program if stack state is invalid #73215
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [mono] Export unmanagedcallersonly method symbols #79424
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [Draft] Fix spurious OOMs #79158
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Replace successive "ldr" and "str" instructions with "ldp" and "stp" #77540
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][aot] Optimize constrained calls made from gsharedvt methods. #79339
  • Fix compression #79412
    area-System.Net
  • Fix thread-safety issues with enumerating ResourceManager. #75054
    area-System.Resources, community-contribution
  • Fixes remaining issues with DynamicDependency attribute and adds tests #79398
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • New ASCII APIs #75012
    area-System.Buffers, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Unroll SpanHelpers.Reverse() for Vector128 #76076
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Remove hard_limit_for_bookkeeping #77480
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [wasm] Outline exception throws in the interp and ifdef out unreachable opcodes #79239
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [JIT] X64 - Extend emitter peephole optimization of eliminating unnecessary `mov` instructions #79381
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Avoid caching compilation data and use value equality for SyntaxNodes #79051
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Add debugger display for huge BigInteger #75796
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Allow preinitializing types with canonical forms #79384
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [Merge-on-Red] - Implement Test Process Watcher #78742
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Do not override content root with default #79411
    Servicing-consider, area-Extensions-Hosting

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Test failed in CI: Microsoft.NET.Build.Tests.GlobalPropertyFlowTests.TestGlobalPropertyFlowInSolution #29478

Closed

  • Wrong path in Microsoft.NET.ApiCompat.targets is preventing ASP.NET Core repo ingesting SDK updates #29451
  • PlatformTarget default value error #29404

PullRequests

Created

  • Add support for an explicit interface implementation methods #29471
    Area-GenAPI
  • Convert the DotnetCommand that call "new" to DotnetNewCommand #29470
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Add support for default values of methods parameters in the GenAPI. #29356
    Area-GenAPI
  • Update Microsoft.NET.ApiCompat.targets for net8.0 #29450
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • extract common logging functionality into ApiSymbolExtensions #29379
    Area-ApiCompat, Area-GenAPI
  • Ensure case-insensitive web.config file name is used #14854
    Area-WebSDK, 8.0.1xx
  • Use linker matching TFM #29441
    Area-ILLink
  • Add base class for all test classes using WatchableApp. #29258
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Try not building the test assets and see what happens #29376
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix bad merge that incorrectly didn't exclude some packages #29435
    Area-NetSDK
  • Change .templateengine folder path #29449
    Area-Infrastructure
  • extend typo correction functionality with StartsWith and Contains #29350
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Nominal and Collection Deconstruction #4082

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • OverflowOnFluentCall is flaky #65910
  • [API Proposal]: Breaking change - Make some types static #65909
  • Shift core projects from netcore3.1 to net6.0 #65905

Closed

  • Possible Optimization: An attribute to force the generation of a jump table for a switch on integer #65703
  • VSCode tasks are broken #65803
  • Automating nullable enable over thousands of csproj #65852
    Next
  • PR 64583 broke LSP-based XAML intellisense #65888
    17.5 P3

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #65904
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65902
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Bind and emit Primary Constructor #65899
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Remove a bunch of compatibility shims for TypeScript #65897
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Remove mutable state from rename #65848
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.6 to release/dev17.6-vs-deps #65911
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to release/dev17.6 #65892
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.6 to release/dev17.6-vs-deps #65894
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Use `dotnet` instead of `.dotnet/dotnet` in VSCode tasks #65804
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, Next
  • Relayer our project system #65890
    Area-IDE
  • Log ServiceHub process exit code on failure #65823
    Area-IDE
  • Add FixAll in Solution support for Enable nullable refactoring #61879
    Area-Analyzers, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.5 to main #65908
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.5 to release/dev17.5-vs-deps #65907
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to release/dev17.5 #65906
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • (main) disable document outline by default #65896
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.5 to main #65903
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.5 to release/dev17.5-vs-deps #65901
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Move classification tests to new framework #65734
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix XAML LSP by using a queue provider instead of subclassing #65898
    Area-IDE, LSP, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to release/dev17.5 #65900
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65893
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/SharedSyntaxTrees #65895
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Move Generate from usage tests to new framework #65887
    Area-IDE, Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Disable document outline #65688
    Area-IDE, OnDeckForServicing

Updated

  • Fix inline rename in MAUI #65818
    Area-IDE
  • Pass cancellation token consistently through lsif generator. #65875
    Area-IDE
  • Change property in Rename system to be clearer #65855
    Area-IDE
  • Remove code for cloning compilations for skeleton references #65842
    Area-IDE
  • Simplify lsif generation concepts #65858
    Area-IDE
  • Simplify GlobalKeywordRecommender #65814
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Enable CA1052 (static holder types should be static) #65830
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Adjust calculation of invocation escape when return type is ref to ref struct #65857
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove the feature flag and change the default for open generated files #60976
    Area-IDE
  • Remove options that have the same editorconfig name #65800
    Area-IDE
  • Enable switch dispatch for is-expressions #65874
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Avoid reporting ref safety errors for discard assignments #65693
    Area-Compilers
  • Deprecate public constructors of various diagnostic analysis context types #64083
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
  • Use the inner pattern to recreate the decision DAG for is-expressions #65878
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • log data for analyzers/codefixes/refactorings #65158
    Area-IDE
  • Update all linked files to have the same content object instances when updating the workspace's solution. #65885
    Area-IDE
  • Move BasicBuild to new integration test framework and implement #65889
    Area-IDE, Area-Infrastructure
  • Add new API to easily tell if a node contains conditional preprocessor directives (without allocations). #65794
    Area-Compilers
  • Add support for draft of semantic tokens LSIF spec to LSIF generator #65860
    Area-IDE, Community

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Eliminate AOT Warnings related to UseMiddleware #45528
  • Eliminate Trim/AOT Warnings related to System.Text.Json #45527
  • Add Project Template for a Web API application with minimal dependencies #45526
  • Support BindAsync Surrogates in Minimal APIs #45525
  • Generate route handler-endpoints at compile time via source generator #45524
  • Start tracking "Stage 1" app in performance lab/infrastructure #45523
  • add exception in documentation with nginx and cloudflare #45522
  • Hot Reload still isn't reliable or consistent with Blazor WebAssembly and "dotnet watch" #45519
  • Custom AuthenticationStateProvider Unexpected Task<AuthenticationState> / Odd behavior #45517
  • Provide input arguments when calling OnParametersSet(Async) method #45516
  • [Minimal APIs] Cannot use Properties with $-character with JsonPolymorphism #45511
  • [Question] Trigger async Event in blazor server side app #45510

Closed

  • Change ASP.NET Core Identity incorrect password logging level #45296
  • Force use of https on NavigationManager #45483
  • [NETE2ESDK]The hotkey "a" for "I agree to the license..." on NET 7.0.0 windows server hosting installer UI doesn't work. #44616
    Infrastructure
  • Model Binding Support for TimeOnly and DateOnly #45376
    8.0
  • Perf improvement: mapaction #45508
  • Perf regression: plainTextEmptyFilter #45509
  • Add option to RedisCache to pass which field to save data in redis. #45350
  • SocketTransportFactory should implement IConnectionListenerFactorySelector publically #45035
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Enable CA1854 analyser #42008
  • Output Caching Does not work if Authorization Header is Present #45469

PullRequests

Created

  • Harden IPv6Any error handling #45529
    area-runtime, Test failures
  • Cover C++ installation issue in BuildErrors #45521
  • Add note about updating an existing installation #45518
  • Fix DictionaryModelBinder null reference issue #45515
    area-web-frameworks
  • Add compatibility suppression files to repo #45507
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Add transport selector interface to Kestrel sockets and QUIC transports #44832
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • fix trace id value, introduce traceparent #44680
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Support STJ Polymorphism #45405
  • Bump SDK to 8.0.100-alpha.1.22607.6 #44925
    area-infrastructure
  • Run Selenium tests on Playwright via an adapter [experiment] #45284
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2064048 #44686
    area-infrastructure
  • Add Kestrel named pipes transport #44426
    area-runtime, blog-candidate
  • Remove obsolete classes #45466
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Route tooling: Support component routes #44656
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor
  • Introduce non-virtual RegisterTokenProviderCore method. #45413
    area-identity
  • Resume the IIS state machine on the thread pool #41271
    Perf, area-runtime

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-09
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • dotnet-dump collect process crash. Unable to read beyond the end of the stream. #3401
    8.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CollectionView Drag and Drop Reordering Can't Drop in Empty Group #12008
  • Dock > Fill dropdown values missing for a BlazorWebView control #12006
    Backlog
  • [Spec] Keyboard Specs for .NET8 #12004
  • Add TextInput property so users can enable/disable if they want tapping outside on an input field to close the keyboard #12003
  • [Android] When a user taps off of an input control the keyboard no longer closes #12002
  • CollectionView/ListView call setters of bound objects unnecessarily #12001
  • LineHeight property on label affects "invisible" line 0 and pushes all other texts down #11998
  • error MSB4019: The imported project "C:\Program Files\dotnet\packs\Microsoft.iOS.Sdk\16.0.1478\tools\msbuild\iOS\Xamarin.iOS.VB.targets" was not found. #11997
  • some images are rendered at the bottom of the page on ios #11996
  • custom font on android only partly loaded: #11995
  • Border margin issue #11994
    Backlog
  • Allow user to draw on image using draw view control in maui #11993
    Backlog
  • [BUG} PlatformImage.FromStream doesn't create an IImage, returns null #11992
  • NET MAUI iOS, the background color is always gray when the CollectionView is selected #11991
  • Frame does not render border correctly while corner radius specified on windows platform #11990
  • Android 12 SplashScreen not working #11988
  • BindableLayout - Invalid height rendered #11987
  • Icons in TabBar for iOS/Mac Catalyst are not sized correctly #11984

Closed

  • Winform Blazor Support JavaScript #11814
  • App crashes only in release mode and only when using AOT #8337
  • Android Release mode build doesn't work #11901
  • Android "No compatible code running on the thread" and crash after hit continue #11837
  • Disabling iOS and Android platform targeting in a Maui project file breaks the publish menu option #11816
  • How to set zoom level of WebView Control in MAUI? #11985
  • [Android] Navigation - PushModal - Page Margin (offset) #11855
    Backlog
  • [Windows] Toolbar icon image not perfectly center. #11786
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Update Development.md #12005
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Housekeeping] Added pending changes in Android AlertManager #11989
    platform/android 🤖, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮, control-dialogalert
  • [Tizen] Add requesting re-layout step #11986
    area/layout 🔲, community ✨, platform/tizen

Merged

  • [net7.0] Prepare MAUI to support building with NuGets #12000
    area/setup 🪄
  • Prepare MAUI to support building with NuGets #11946
    area/setup 🪄
  • Update Essentials Flashlight API Docs #11920
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Update Essentials MainThread API Docs #11934
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • Update Editor.cs To solve HorizontalTextAlignment problem #10981
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, s/pr-needs-author-input, stale
  • Added StartPath to get/set initial BlazorWebView URL #11942
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • [Android] Fix SwipeItemView size issues #10522
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • Fix Switch Off Track Color - Fixes #10099 #10758
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-switch
  • Address Android SearchBar keyboard issue relating to TextTransform #11981
    area/controls 🎮
  • [iOS] Fix Border Content clipping issues #10964
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎
  • Implement Keyboard on SearchBarHandler #9851
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Make MAUI into 1 workload and lots of NuGets instead of a full workload #11206
    area/setup 🪄
  • [xamlc] remove `LoadInSeparateAppDomain` and `static` state #11982
    area/Xaml </>, area/perf 🏎️, 8.0-preview1
  • Fix shapes sizing and alignment #9607
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️
  • Avoid crash using BoxView visibility (avoid unnecessary parent) #11439
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮
  • [macOS/iOS] Fix RequestedThemeChanged event #11199
    t/bug, area/Xaml </>
  • Update Essentials FileSystem API Docs #11919
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [iOS] Fix crash typing in Shell SearchHandler #11927
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢, version/ios-16
  • [Android] Fix clipped text in SwipeItem under some DPIs #11931
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, control-swipeview
  • [Android] Fix shadows size in clipped views #11603
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️
  • [Android] Clear before each Image Source change #11787
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-image
  • [macOS] Fix crash using Shell SearchHandler on Catalyst #11926
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, area/shell 🐢
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #11949
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Query throws exception when using TPC and abstract base class has an Owned entity type property. #29818
  • Use interpreted dynamic delegates when they're invoked just once, instead of compiling #29814
  • Is CommandCreating/Created/Initialized interceptor guaranteed to be invoked? #29813
  • MigrationsEndPoint throwing `InvalidOperationException: Incorrect Content-Type:` on load #29816
  • Filtering over owned entity nested in another owned entity throws InvalidOperationException #29812
  • SQLite: RETURNING clause doesn't work with AFTER triggers #29811
  • dotnet ef dbcontext scaffold with user secret #29809

Closed

  • EFCore 7 ValueGeneratedOnUpdate not working on Guid that is not a key #29752
  • Confusing doc-comments on DeleteBehavior enum #29261
    8.0.0
  • UseMemoryCache API #18938
    8.0.0
  • Add links to conceptual docs for OptionsBuilder methods #26552
    8.0.0
  • Misleading comment, since it doesn't accept null or lambda without property. #24972
    8.0.0
  • Typo on the page #29125
    8.0.0
  • Document DetectChanges for local methods that may do a full scan #29747
    8.0.0
  • Ability to specify serializer for ToJson() method #29810
  • Removal of a new optional navigation entity does not reset foreign key current value #29318
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/7.0] Include table name for overrides in snapshot. #29820
    Servicing-consider
  • Include table name for overrides in snapshot. #29819
  • Undo all my debugging attempts. #29817
  • Switch to interpreted delegates for one-off invocations #29815
  • Fix to #29513 - Json: improve projection deduplication for scenarios containing collection indexers #29808

Merged

  • Clean up and document local DetectChanges behavior, plus other API doc fixes #29792
  • Second attempt at enabling debugging in richnav build. #29806
  • Null FK value when detaching Added principal by Remove #29803
  • Bump Newtonsoft.Json from 13.0.1 to 13.0.2 in /test/EFCore.Specification.Tests #29801
    type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:

Updated

  • Translate DateTimeOffset.ToUnixTime[Seconds|Milliseconds] #28978
  • Avoid redundant looping in property metadata #29805
  • [release/7.0] Avoid reduntant looping in property metadata #29807
    Servicing-consider

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-09
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #15111

Merged

  • Remove source-build tarball creation infrastructure #15114
  • Addressing NuGet prebuilts #15112

Updated

  • Add KnownILLinkPack to bundled versions #15106
  • Delete some test folders once run to not leave them on the machine #15094
